EmailTemplate.name: RE: Follow up from MBO Partners (1319720644.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Follow up from MBO Partners (1319720644.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Bob,
Thank you for the update! Good luck with everything and I hope to hear from you in the future.
Have a great weekend, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Bob [mailto:yon_r@bellsouth.net] Sent: Wednesday, October 26, 2011 7:27 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: Follow up from MBO Partners
Hi Nicolette,
Thanks for following up. However, I have decided that at this time to not use the MBO services. There may be a time in the future when MBO services might be just what I need, but not at this time.
Thanks, Bob
From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Tuesday, October 25, 2011 9:57 AM To: yon_r@bellsouth.net Subject: Follow up from MBO Partners
Hi Bob,
I hope all is well! I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding MBO Partners. I know you had expressed interest in using our services and I wanted to reach out to see if you had any additional questions. Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you.
Have a great day,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
